options.label: Get all forms
options.name: getAllForms
options.description: Returns all the forms associated with your account

options.label: Get Typeform Responses
options.name: getTypeformResponses
options.description: Returns the submissions for your typeforms in JSON format

inputParameters.label: Form Id
inputParameters.name: formId
inputParameters.description: The form id to retrieve all the responses to your typeform

inputParameters.label: Request Body
inputParameters.name: requestBody
inputParameters.description: The json object to create or update your typeform
